SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.util

Class QueryAppender

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.util.QueryAppender
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParamAppender
public class QueryAppender extends Object
Facility class for appending JPQL queries. This appender encapsulates basic structure of JPQL queries.

    • addWhere

      public void addWhere(String clause)
      Adds the specified sub-clause to the current where clause. This method doesn't insert the proper operator. Use this method only when it's necessary to add a single where sub-clause.
      Parameters:
      clause - Clause to be added to where clause

    • addWhere

      public void addWhere(String operator, String clause)
      Adds where clause to the current sub-clause using the operator provided
      Parameters:
      operator - Operator to use for joining the sub-clause with the current where clause. It should be either "or" or "and"
      clause - Clause to be added to the current where clause

    • getQuery

      public String getQuery()
      Gets the content of this appended as an JPQL string.
      Returns:
      Returns the JPQL string.

    • getWhereClause

      public String getWhereClause()
      Gets the current where clause
      Returns:
      Returns the where clause

    • isAppended

      public boolean isAppended()
      Checks if this appender contains a where clause appended.
      Returns:
      Returns true if there is a where clause appended and false otherwise
